summary: I was getting tired of having big empty spaces in the Sky Haven Temple, so I made this mod, which adds some Blades Soldiers, and some custom Blades warriors, everyone except for the vendors, and Delphine (might make her one), and Esbern are followers, the soldiers are set to respawn if they die.
descriptionHtml:
I was getting tired of having big empty spaces in the Sky Haven Temple, so I made this mod, which adds some Blades Soldiers, and some custom Blades warriors, everyone except for the vendors, and Delphine (might make her one), and Esbern are followers, the soldiers are set to respawn if they die.

*The Blades Captain does not have ghost like textures yet, she is suppose to be the ghost of the captain from the start of Oblivion, I will work on trying to make her look more ghostly, maybe even summonable*

Required Mods:
Apachii Skyhair


Recommended Mods:
author: Kamikazi91127
